title: 1.7.10U端模组服，玩家无法升级卡0级
author: givemeashit
txt_content: 部分玩家会这样，不知道什么毛病，求大神

replies.author: linan47852154
replies.txt_content:
givemeashit 发表于 2020-2-28 23:35
有的有的
打开/config/TinkersConstruct.cfg
    B:"Keep hunger on death"=false
    B:"Keep levels on death"=false
这么改了

replies.author: givemeashit
replies.txt_content:
linan47852154 发表于 2020-2-28 23:22
有匠魂吗？
有的有的

replies.txt_content:

    B:"Keep hunger on death"=false
    B:"Keep levels on death"=f ...
